item.title: NondeterministicSorting
item.description: Original Author/link Originally described by Paulo A.G. Sivilotti and Scott Pike Paper and poster available online: Details See paper and poster for full details. A high level summary is provided below: A group of students are chosen to represent elements in an array. Each student is given a sign/sticker that indicates their position in the array. Each student is also given an index card with a random integer value on it.
